name: scuffed-passwords
description: An app to store your passwords (don't really do it, the app is more than likely very scuffed and held together with duct tape, rubber bands and fairy dust) very securely!

scripts.db:dev:up: docker run --name scuffed-db -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=scuffedUser -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=scuffedPassword -e POSTGRES_DB=scuffed -v postgres:/var/lib/postgresql/data -d postgres
scripts.db:dev:down: docker stop scuffed-db && docker rm scuffed-db

author: Krzysztof Piekarczyk <krzys@piekarczyk.eu>
